retargetingAdGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group whose impressions should be used for retargeting. This field must not be specified if retargetingCampaignId is provided.

inheritFromAdvertiser.description: Set to TRUE to inherit domain list from advertiser.

includeUnmeasurableImpressions.description: Must be false if viewabilityTier is set to ALL_TIERS. You can set to true to include impressions that can not be measured when a viewabilityTier other than ALL_TIERS is selected. We recommend setting to false if high viewability is your goal.

DSPCreateDVBrandSafetyContentCategoriesW.description: A map from content categories to risk level to exclude from targeting. Available keys are: [ADULT_CONTENT, ALCOHOL, CRIME, DEATH_INJURIES, DISASTER_AVIATION, DISASTER_MAN_MADE, DISASTER_NATURAL, DISAS...

key.description: Available keys are: [ADULT_CONTENT, ALCOHOL, CRIME, DEATH_INJURIES, DISASTER_AVIATION, DISASTER_MAN_MADE, DISASTER_NATURAL, DISASTER_TERRORIST_EVENTS, DISASTER_VEHICLE, HATE_SPEECH, PROFANITY, SUBSTANCE_ABUSE, TOBACCO_ECIGARETTES, VIOLENCE_EXTREME_GRAPHIC].

DSPCreateDayPartTarget.description: Target based on time of day.

DSPCreateDomainFileTarget.description: Targets domains based on list provided via file upload.

domainFileKey.description: The URL of the domain to target.

DSPCreateDomainListTarget.description: Targets domains based on an existing domain list.

domainListId.description: The ID of the domain list to target.

domainName.description: The URL of the domain to target.

DSPCreateDomainTarget.description: Target based on a specified domain.

universalAttention.description: One omni-channel segment that is informed by data from all DV campaigns to help avoid serving ads on generally poor performing apps and domains.

appAgeRating.description: A list of app age ratings to be used for excluding apps. For example, TEENS_12_PLUS will only exclude apps with content rated for everyone ages 12 and over. UNKNOWN will exclude apps with content unrated or unknown to Double Verify.

contentCategories.description: A list of content categories to exclude from targeting.

excludeAppsWithInsufficientRating.description: Set to true to exclude unofficial apps or apps with insufficient user ratings (<100 lifetime).

unknownContent.description: Set to true to exclude unknown content.

blockAppAndSites.description: Set to true to block applications and sites with insufficient historical fraud and invalid traffic statistics. This will not be applicable if ALLOW_ALL is chosen.

excludeImpressions.description: Set to true to exclude impressions delivered to devices identified to be fraudulent or invalid.

contentCategories.description: A list of content categories to exclude from targeting.

unknownContent.description: Set to true to exclude unknown content.

includeUnmeasurableImpressions.description: Set to true to include impressions where impressions can't be measured.

addToBudgetSpentAmount.description: Applies only to THIRD_PARTY_APPLIED_FEE. When set to true, third-party applied fees are are added on top of the total ad group budget spent amount in reports.

feeValue.description: The fee amount expressed as the feeValueType. AMAZON_AUDIENCE_FEE AND THIRD_PARTY_AUDIENCE_FEE is in the currency of the marketplace. All other CPM based fees are in the currency of the advertiser. For percentages, 100 represents 100%.

DSPCreateFoldPositionTarget.description: Targets ads in the specified fold position

applyBorder.description: Apply a boarder to the image to fit rules for some supplies.

eventMaxCount.description: The maximum number of times an EventType is served per user. For ADSP ad group, maximum supported value is 500.

timeCount.description: The value associated with the time and unit of time for this frequency cap.

kpiValue.description: The value of the KPI that the campaign is working to optimize.

assetId.description: The asset library ID associated with the image asset.

assetVersion.description: The asset library version associated with the image asset.

formatProperties.description: The cropping and positioning properties associated with the asset.

excludeContent.description: Set to true to exclude content that Integral Ad Science is not able to rate.

avoidanceSegments.description: The unique identifier of the IAS contextual avoidance segment

topicalSegments.description: The unique identifier of the IAS contextual topical targeting segment

verticalSegments.description: The unique identifier of the IAS contextual vertical targeting segment

keyword.description: The customer search term or text to target

url.description: The url to drive users to learn more via the video CallToAction.

locationId.description: The ID of the geographic location to target.

defaultValue.description: The default value. Either the default value or the marketplace settings should always be specified

value.description: The monetary amount of the budget cap in the given currency.

avoidanceList.description: The unique identifiers of misinformation targets

targetingList.description: The unique identifiers of trusted news targets

impressionTrackingUrls.description: The third party urls to trigger when an impression is recorded.

excludeAppsAndDomains.description: Set to true to exclude traffic from Apps and Domains identified to be fraudulent or invalid.

excludeIpAddressAndUserAgents.description: Set to true to exclude traffic from IPV4 and IPV6 addresses and user agents identified to be fraudulent or invalid.

excludeOttAndMobileDevices.description: Set to true to exclude traffic from OTT and Mobile devices identified to be fraudulent or invalid.

excludeRemovedAppsFromAppStores.description: Set to true to exlude traffic from Apps that have been removed from the google play and apple app stores in the last 6 months.

DSPDomainFileTarget.description: Targets domains based on list provided via file upload.

domainFileId.description: The ID associated to the domain file to target. Read-only and created based on the inputted domainFileKey.

domainFileKey.description: The URL of the domain to target.

domainFileUrl.description: The file containing the domains uploaded. It expires in one hour.

DSPDomainListTarget.description: Targets domains based on an existing domain list.

domainListId.description: The ID of the domain list to target.

domainName.description: The URL of the domain to target.

DSPDomainTarget.description: Target based on a specified domain.

universalAttention.description: One omni-channel segment that is informed by data from all DV campaigns to help avoid serving ads on generally poor performing apps and domains.

appAgeRating.description: A list of app age ratings to be used for excluding apps. For example, TEENS_12_PLUS will only exclude apps with content rated for everyone ages 12 and over. UNKNOWN will exclude apps with content unrated or unknown to Double Verify.

contentCategories.description: A list of content categories to exclude from targeting.

excludeAppsWithInsufficientRating.description: Set to true to exclude unofficial apps or apps with insufficient user ratings (<100 lifetime).

unknownContent.description: Set to true to exclude unknown content.

blockAppAndSites.description: Set to true to block applications and sites with insufficient historical fraud and invalid traffic statistics. This will not be applicable if ALLOW_ALL is chosen.

excludeImpressions.description: Set to true to exclude impressions delivered to devices identified to be fraudulent or invalid.

contentCategories.description: A list of content categories to exclude from targeting.

unknownContent.description: Set to true to exclude unknown content.

includeUnmeasurableImpressions.description: Set to true to include impressions where impressions can't be measured.

DSPDspContentRatingEnum.description:
| DspContentRatingEnum | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `SUITABLE_FOR_ALL_AUDIENCES` | Equivalent to content that is rated G (film), TV-Y (TV), TV-Y7 (TV), TV-G (TV), EC (game), or E (game).

addToBudgetSpentAmount.description: Applies only to THIRD_PARTY_APPLIED_FEE. When set to true, third-party applied fees are are added on top of the total ad group budget spent amount in reports.

feeValue.description: The fee amount expressed as the feeValueType. AMAZON_AUDIENCE_FEE AND THIRD_PARTY_AUDIENCE_FEE is in the currency of the marketplace. All other CPM based fees are in the currency of the advertiser. For percentages, 100 represents 100%.

DSPFeeType.description:
| FeeType | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `AMAZON_DSP` | A service fee for using Amazon DSP and subtracted from the budget. This fee is applied as a percent of supply cost.

DSPFeeValueType.description:
| FeeValueType | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `FIXED_CPM` | Charged based on a fixed CPM. The currency depends on the feeType.

DSPFoldPositionTarget.description: Targets ads in the specified fold position

applyBorder.description: Apply a boarder to the image to fit rules for some supplies.

eventMaxCount.description: The maximum number of times an EventType is served per user. For ADSP ad group, maximum supported value is 500.

timeCount.description: The value associated with the time and unit of time for this frequency cap.

DSPFrequencyTargetingSetting.description:
| FrequencyTargetingSetting | Description |
| --- | --- |

| `HOUSEHOLD` | Control frequency an ad will be selected across people within the same household. |

| `CONSIDERATION` | Indicates a goal of driving consideration. |

scopes.advertising::audiences: Grants access to data provider APIs
scopes.advertising::campaign_management: Grants write access to campaign management.
scopes.advertising::test:create_account: Grants write access to create test accounts functionality
scopes.cpc_advertising:campaign_management: Grants write access to campaign management. Legacy name (no difference from advertising::campaign_management)

post.description:
Create Ad Association

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["campaign_edit"]

Create ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Create ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "creatives_edit"]

Create campaigns

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Create target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Delete Ad Association

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["campaign_edit"]

Delete target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Query Ad Association

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["creatives_view", "campaign_view"]

List ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_view", "campaign_view", 
"advertiser_campaign_view"]

List ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "creatives_view", "advertiser_campaign_view"]

Query campaign

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_view", "campaign_view", 
"advertiser_campaign_view"]

List target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_view", "campaign_view", 
"advertiser_campaign_view", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Update Ad Association

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["campaign_edit"]

Update ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Update ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "creatives_edit"]

Update campaign

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]
